title: 820-2915 Wifi: No hardware installed [solved]
message: Hey Louis, I decided to join the forum, even though I have watched all of your videos and attended your tutoring! I have a 820-2915 that is showing the wifi symbol crossed out and stating no hardware is installed.  In my little experience, I have never encounter this problem that was not software related.  Anyone have any ideas on where I should start??

title: 820-2915 Wifi: No hardware installed [solved]
message: Have you tried with a different Wifi card, these go bad from time to time.

title: 820-2915 Wifi: No hardware installed [solved]
message:
First thing, try known good wifi card/cable.

Second thing, what voltage do you get on each side of L3404?

A "hint" that the wifi card is dead is when it pulls down AP_RESET_CONN_L when all signals are present to create AP_RESET_CONN_L.

title: 820-2915 Wifi: No hardware installed [solved]
message: Wifi card replaced, and it works. Thanks for the help.

title: 820-2915 Wifi: No hardware installed [solved]
message: Glad you solved it, now make like hot potato and dump this on somebody else before GPU dies!
